title: My LoL is updating again for some reason and it's taking forever
body:
I removed my LoL from the desktop because I was trying to fix something then I re-added it by dragging it from the Applications folder (mac). Now when I open it, it's taking EXTREMELY long to load. It takes like 1 hour just to load 5%. 

Anyone have any suggestions?

replies.body:
Sounds like an auto repair or something?

Never heard of that sort of thing happening.
